originContent: # BPCells
translatedContent: # BPCells

originContent: BPCells is a package for high performance single cell analysis of large RNA-seq and ATAC-seq datasets.
translatedContent: BPCells 是一个用于大规模 RNA-seq 和 ATAC-seq 数据集的高性能单细胞分析软件包。

originContent: It can run normalization and PCA of a 1.3M cell dataset in 4 minutes with 2GB of RAM, or create scATAC-seq peak matrices from fragment coordinates with 50x less CPU time than ArchR or SnapATAC2.
translatedContent: 它可以在 2GB 内存下用 4 分钟时间完成 130 万细胞数据集的归一化和 PCA，或从片段坐标创建 scATAC-seq 峰矩阵，CPU 时间比 ArchR 或 SnapATAC2 少 50 倍。

originContent: BPCells can even handle the full CELLxGENE census human dataset, running full precision PCA on a 44M cell x 60k gene matrix in 6 hours on a laptop or <1 hour on a server. See our [benchmarks page](https://bnprks.github.io/BPCells/articles/web-only/benchmarks.html) for details.
translatedContent: BPCells 甚至能够处理完整的 CELLxGENE 人类普查数据集，在笔记本电脑上对 4400 万细胞 x 6 万基因矩阵运行全精度 PCA 只需 6 小时，或在服务器上少于 1 小时。详情请见我们的[基准测试页面](https://bnprks.github.io/BPCells/articles/web-only/benchmarks.html)。

originContent: BPCells provides:
translatedContent: BPCells 提供：

originContent: - Efficient storage of single cell datasets via bitpacking compression
translatedContent: - 通过位打包压缩高效存储单细胞数据集

originContent: - Fast, disk-backed RNA-seq and ATAC-seq data processing powered by C++
translatedContent: - 由 C++ 支持的快速、磁盘支持的 RNA-seq 和 ATAC-seq 数据处理

originContent: - Downstream analysis such as marker genes, and clustering
translatedContent: - 下游分析，如标记基因和聚类

originContent: - Interoperability with AnnData, 10x datasets, R sparse matrices, and GRanges
translatedContent: - 与 AnnData、10x 数据集、R 稀疏矩阵和 GRanges 的互操作性

originContent: - Demonstrated scalability to 44M cells on a laptop
translatedContent: - 已展示可扩展至 4400 万细胞的能力，运行于笔记本电脑

originContent: Additionally, BPCells exposes its optimized data processing infrastructure for use in scaling 3rd party single cell tools (e.g. Seurat)
translatedContent: 此外，BPCells 还开放其优化的数据处理架构，用于扩展第三方单细胞工具（如 Seurat）

originContent: ## R Installation
translatedContent: ## R 安装

originContent: We recommend installing BPCells directly from github:
translatedContent: 我们建议直接从 github 安装 BPCells：

originContent: remotes::install_github("bnprks/BPCells/r")
translatedContent: remotes::install_github("bnprks/BPCells/r")

originContent: Before installing, you must have the HDF5 library installed and accessible on your system.
translatedContent: 安装前，您必须已在系统上安装并可访问HDF5库。

originContent: HDF5 can be installed from your choice of package manager. See operating system specific instructions below.
translatedContent: HDF5可以通过您选择的软件包管理器安装。请参阅以下针对操作系统的具体说明。
对于在github安装时遇到问题的Mac和Windows用户，请查看我们的[R-universe](https://bnprks.r-universe.dev/BPCells)

originContent: For Mac and Windows users having trouble installing from github, check our [R-universe](https://bnprks.r-universe.dev/BPCells)
translatedContent: 页面，了解安装预编译二进制包的说明。这些二进制包会自动跟踪最新的github主分支。

originContent: page for instructions to install pre-built binary packages. These binary packages automatically track the latest github main branch.

translatedContent: 感谢Conda Forge R团队的[@mfansler](https://github.com/mfansler)，BPCells可通过conda安装（详见[issue #241](https://github.com/bnprks/BPCells/issues/241)）。

originContent: BPCells is available via conda thanks to [@mfansler](https://github.com/mfansler) from the Conda Forge R team (see [issue #241](https://github.com/bnprks/BPCells/issues/241) for details).
translatedContent: 任何关于bioconda包的问题应在[bioconda-recipes](https://github.com/bioconda/bioconda-recipes/)报告。版本更新由bioconda团队管理。

originContent: Any issues with the bioconda package should be reported at [bioconda-recipes](https://github.com/bioconda/bioconda-recipes/). Version updates are managed by the bioconda team.

translatedContent: <details>

originContent: <details>
translatedContent: <summary>点击这里查看基于github安装的操作系统具体安装信息</summary>

translatedContent: ### Linux

originContent: ### Linux
translatedContent: 在Linux上获取HDF5依赖通常相当简单

originContent: Obtaining the HDF5 dependency is usually pretty straightforward on Linux

translatedContent: - apt: `sudo apt-get install libhdf5-dev`

originContent: - apt: `sudo apt-get install libhdf5-dev`
translatedContent: - yum: `sudo yum install hdf5-devel`

originContent: - yum: `sudo yum install hdf5-devel`
translatedContent: - conda: `conda install -c conda-forge hdf5`

originContent: - conda: `conda install -c conda-forge hdf5`
translatedContent: - 注意：Linux用户应尽可能优先使用其发行版的软件包管理器（如`apt`或`yum`），

originContent: - Note: Linux users should prefer their distro's package manager (e.g. `apt` or `yum`) when possible,
translatedContent: 因为这通常能提供更稳定的安装体验。

originContent: as it appears to give a slightly more reliable installation experience.

translatedContent: ### Windows

originContent: ### Windows
translatedContent: 在Windows上从源代码编译R包需要安装[R tools for Windows](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/)。

originContent: Compiling R packages from source on Windows requires installing [R tools for Windows](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/). See [Issue #9](https://github.com/bnprks/BPCells/issues/9) for more discussion.
translatedContent: 详情请见[Issue #9](https://github.com/bnprks/BPCells/issues/9)。

originContent: ### MacOS
translatedContent: ### MacOS

originContent: For MacOS, installing HDF5 through homebrew seems to be most reliable: `brew install hdf5`.
translatedContent: 对于MacOS，通过homebrew安装HDF5似乎最为可靠：`brew install hdf5`。

originContent: **Mac-specific troubleshooting**:
translatedContent: **Mac特定故障排除**：

originContent: - **Macs with ARM CPUs**: a common error is to have an ARM-based HDF5 install but an x86-based
translatedContent: - **ARM架构Mac**：常见错误是安装了ARM版HDF5，但R是x86版本。

originContent: R install. This will cause errors when BPCells tries to access HDF5 during installation.
translatedContent: 这会导致BPCells在安装时访问HDF5出错。

originContent: - Check your R installation
translatedContent: - 通过运行`sessionInfo()`检查R安装，查看“Platform”下显示的是ARM还是x86。

originContent: by running `sessionInfo()`, and seeing if it lists ARM or x86 under "Platform".
translatedContent: - 最简单的方案是使用ARM版R，因为homebrew默认安装ARM版hdf5。

originContent: - The easiest option is to use
translatedContent: - 也[可以](https://codetinkering.com/switch-homebrew-arm-x86/)（虽然较复杂）安装x86版本的homebrew以访问x86版hdf5。

originContent: ARM R because homebrew will default to an ARM hdf5 installation
translatedContent: - **旧Mac（10.14 Mojave或更早版本）**：旧Mac默认编译器不支持所需的

originContent: - It is [possible](https://codetinkering.com/switch-homebrew-arm-x86/) (though tricky) to install an x86 copy of homebrew in order to access an x86 version of hdf5
translatedContent: C++17文件系统特性。详见[issue #3](https://github.com/bnprks/BPCells/issues/3#issuecomment-1375238635)。

originContent: - **Older Macs (10.14 Mojave or older)**: The default compiler on old Macs does not support needed
C++17 filesystem features. See [issue #3](https://github.com/bnprks/BPCells/issues/3#issuecomment-1375238635) for
tips getting a newer compiler set up via homebrew.
translatedContent: 通过 homebrew 设置更新编译器的提示。

originContent: ### Supported compilers
translatedContent: ### 支持的编译器

originContent: In most cases, you will already have an appropriate compiler. BPCells recommends
translatedContent: 在大多数情况下，您已经拥有合适的编译器。BPCells 推荐

originContent: gcc >=9.1, or clang >= 9.0.
translatedContent: gcc >=9.1，或 clang >= 9.0。

originContent: This corresponds to versions from late-2018 and newer.
translatedContent: 这对应于 2018 年末及以后的版本。

originContent: Older versions may work in some cases so long as they
translatedContent: 旧版本在某些情况下可能可用，只要它们

originContent: have basic C++17 support, but they are not officially supported.
translatedContent: 支持基本的 C++17，但官方不支持。

originContent: </details>
translatedContent: </details>

originContent: <details>
translatedContent: <details>

originContent: <summary>Click here for troubleshooting information for github-based installs</summary>
translatedContent: <summary>点击此处查看基于 Github 安装的故障排除信息</summary>

originContent: ### General Installation troubleshooting
translatedContent: ### 一般安装故障排除

originContent: BPCells tries to print informative error messages during compilation to help diagnose the problem. For a more
translatedContent: BPCells 会在编译过程中尝试打印有用的错误信息以帮助诊断问题。若需更

originContent: verbose set of information, run `Sys.setenv(BPCELLS_DEBUG_INSTALL="true")` prior to `remotes::install_github("bnprks/BPCells/r")`. If you still can't solve the issue with that additional information, feel free to file a Github issue, being
translatedContent: 详细的信息，请在执行 `remotes::install_github("bnprks/BPCells/r")` 之前运行 `Sys.setenv(BPCELLS_DEBUG_INSTALL="true")`。如果在获得这些附加信息后仍无法解决问题，欢迎提交 Github 问题，并务必使用[可折叠章节](https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/writing-on-github/working-with-advanced-formatting/organizing-information-with-collapsed-sections) 来附加详细的安装日志。

originContent: sure to use a [collapsible section](https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/writing-on-github/working-with-advanced-formatting/organizing-information-with-collapsed-sections) for the verbose installation log.

translatedContent: </details>

originContent: </details>

translatedContent: ## Python 安装

originContent: ## Python Installation

translatedContent: BPCells 可以直接通过 pip 安装：

originContent: BPCells can be directly installed via pip:
```shell
translatedContent: ```shell

originContent: python -m pip install bpcells
translatedContent: python -m pip install bpcells
## 贡献

originContent: ## Contributing
translatedContent: BPCells 是一个开源项目，我们欢迎高质量的贡献。如果您

originContent: BPCells is an open source project, and we welcome quality contributions. If you
translatedContent: 有兴趣贡献，并且具备 C++ 以及 Python 或 R 的经验，欢迎

originContent: are interested in contributing and have experience with C++, along with Python
translatedContent: 随时联系我们，分享您想要实现的想法。时间允许的话，我们

originContent: or R, feel free to reach out with ideas you would like to implement yourself.
translatedContent: 很乐意为您提供入门指导。

originContent: We're happy to provide pointers for how to get started, time permitting.

translatedContent: 如果您不熟悉 C++，贡献代码可能比较困难，

originContent: If you are unfamiliar with C++ it will be difficult for you to contribute code,
translatedContent: 但提供带有

originContent: but detailed bug reports with
translatedContent: [可复现示例](https://reprex.tidyverse.org/articles/reprex-dos-and-donts.html)

originContent: [reproducible examples](https://reprex.tidyverse.org/articles/reprex-dos-and-donts.html)
translatedContent: 的详细错误报告仍然是很好的帮助方式。Github 问题区是

originContent: are still a great way to help out. Github issues are the best forum for this.
translatedContent: 报告这类问题的最佳论坛。

originContent: If you maintain a single cell analysis package and want to use BPCells to
translatedContent: 如果您维护单细胞分析包，想利用 BPCells

originContent: improve your scalability, we're happy to provide advice. We have had a couple of labs
translatedContent: 提升可扩展性，我们乐意提供建议。到目前为止，已有

originContent: try this so far, with promising success. Email is the best way to get in touch
translatedContent: 几个实验室尝试过，取得了可喜的成功。通过电子邮件是

originContent: for this (look in the `DESCRIPTION` file on github for contact info). Python
translatedContent: 联系的最佳方式（可在 github 的 `DESCRIPTION` 文件中找到联系方式）。

originContent: developers welcome, though the current python package is still in experimental status.
translatedContent: 欢迎 Python 开发者，虽然当前的 Python 包仍处于实验阶段。
